Text: You're more than welcome... Someone had to put up a flac copy.. With artwork and If not me who ;)
Unfortunately, all 3 CDs are clipping heavily. This is either a bad rip or a bad engineered. Shame, because very good tracks are there but it's not listenable on any serious equipment.

There's nothing wrong with the rip.. All is good. I've just ripped another two physical copies I've got on different PCs exactly the same.. Most Ministry of Sound has questionable mastering.. I just find it funny that you have never made a comment on my other MOS flac uploads weird..

Don't get me wrong, I love your rips, but there is definitely something wrong with this one. If you say that the rip is OK, then all I can say is that it is badly remastered - engineered with a lot of compression and loudness, clipping on all songs. It sounds better on a cheap headphones than on some mid-range equipment. I guess maybe they did it on purpose. Cheers and keep up the good work.

Thanks for the rip.
Yea I noticed that. Recently iTunes has been issuing a lot of albums that are mixed/mastered with the intent of being listened to on low end headphones and earbuds, I wouldn't be surprised if MOS was (trying) to do the same thing.
But it's still a solid mix. Thanks oneanight!
